TopicTitle: South-West Launch Site - Kerbal Konstructs Content

Articles.Content: Plox gib download, I see big things for this little lauch pad...
has the mod been abandoned?

> 
> has the mod been abandoned?

No.

However, it has been put on the back-burner, pending a redesign to be ocean based facility.

I do not have so much free-time, so am focusing on my primary mods ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
thats cool, it was just that it all went a bit quiet.

Another suggestion: Electron (Rocket labs)

I can make some of the parts of the rocket if there is enough demand to construct an additional launch site.

Hope 1.1 will be more KK friendly

Beale, I dont know if you are aware, but looks like there is an unofficial community fix for KK that worx in 1.0.5...Supposedly the method may not carry over into 1.1, tho, so we'll see...

So will there maybe be hope for this mod later on?
Beale, Kerbal Konstructs works again! so will development resume?
